about_the_game:
Spellers is an online magical brawl magical brawl inspired by Minecraft’s Sheep Wars gamemode where you use spells of all sorts to help your allies and defeat your opponents.

SPELLS


With more than 20 spells available, Spellers proposes a limitless number of combinations to fit all situations. Let your imagination run wild, be crafty, launch yourself into the air and blow the entire screen!

GAME MODES


Vote for a global pool of spells, choose one spell each, or customize at will with custom settings ranging from health boosts to insane jump heights, Spellers has it all, you can even play a protect your VIP game mode with Protect the King

CUSTOMIZE!

What’s a wizard without its wand, well ironed robe and silly hat ? Unlock your cosmetics by simply playing the game and earn the right to wear them on the battlefield.

Play Online or Offline

Play online with up to 15 players per match, in public lobbies or in private customizable rooms. Bots await you in Local or Private Online matches to sharpen your skills and master your spellcasting abilities.

Co-Op Mode

Survive waves of enemies storming towards your castle. Build up turrets and defenses in this integrated 3D Tower Defense Co-Op Mode. Team up with up to 4 players and defend your kingdom’s castle.

short_description: Take on other wizards in this magical brawl inspired by Minecraft’s Sheep Wars gamemode. Customize your character with over 50 different combinations, use it to explore a huge variety of interactive maps and choose from over 20 different spells to dominate your opponents.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Italian, Bulgarian, Dutch
